content: this fast to crochet chemo cap has you holding two strands of lion brand coboo you will love the texture and it has a unique ribbing stitch it is very soft and easy on the skin it is made using lion brand coboo 1 easy to find yarn 2 use a tapered hook 3 sized to fit those who have lost their hair 4 easy to read crochet pattern 5 unique cross stitch ribbing you will be happy with how fast this hat is to crochet if you use the lion brand coboo yarn it will be perfect to donate to those going through chemo copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright© krissys over the mountain crochet 2024 do not sell alter or redistribute this pattern in any way or form you have my permission to sell your finished product but you are responsible for the finished product no mass production
